channel.title: Tokyo-Jogging
channel.description: Tokyo-Jogging is a mashup project using wiimote and google street view.

item.title: Now Tokyo-Jogging supports your Nunchuk.
item.description:
Today Tokyo-jogging updated the program for the first time in a year. We started to support your nunchuk. Once your wiimote was detected, connect your nunchuk to it. You can control the view by analog stick of nunchuk.
The latest program is at google code. You can download it by svn command. svn co http://tokyo-jogging.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ tokyo-jogging
Or you can download binary files from downloads page. http://code.google.com/p/tokyo-jogging/downloads/list
Now, let's start jogging. :-)

item.title: From Google Code to github
item.description:
Today we changed Tokyo-Jogging's source code repositry address from Google Code to github. You can download the latest file by git.
git clone git@github.com:katsuma/tokyo-jogging.git
